isis.stitle: TSI 93-03-02 - Proper Installation of Midland Air Suspension Height Control Valve(s) (Navistar Part Number 2001006C92)

subjectgroup.subject: Proper Installation of Midland Air Suspension Height Control Valve(s) (Navistar Part Number 2001006C92)

geninfo.para: The height control valve, when installed properly on a single or dual valve system, will have the punch mark ( Figure 1) on the valve spool positioned toward the vertical linkage as shown in Figure 1. If the punch mark is not positioned as shown in Figure 1, the valve will operate in reverse. The punch mark may be hard to see because it will be under the lever arm.
See Service Manual Section CTS-5025 in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the proper adjustment procedure and ride height specification.
